item.title: Australian PM vows 'full force of law' after arson attack at synagogue
item.description: “Antisemitism has no place in Australia,” Anthony Albanese said after the latest in a string of attacks.

item.title: A boy saved by barbed wire, a 'destroyed' camp and missed warning signs in Texas floods
item.description: Survivors describe a deluge that pounced with devastating speed in the pre-dawn hours in central Texas.

item.title: Search for missing continues as Texas floods kill 51, including 15 children
item.description: Hundreds of rescuers search for people missing after flash floods killed 51 people, including 15 children.

item.title: Elon Musk says he is launching new political party
item.description: The world's richest man says he is setting up a new political organisation called the America Party.

item.title: Texas flood victims: Girl 'living her best life' and 'heart and soul' of camp
item.description: Eight-year-old Renee Smajstrla and "strong and powerful" camp director Jane Ragsdale were swept away.
